text: Mariëlle Vleugels (born 6 February 1992) is a Dutch softball player. In September 2021, after played her 400th match in the Dutch national league, she was honored by the Dutch softball federation. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team since 2011. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:People from Ridderkerk Category:Sportspeople from South Holland Category:Sportswomen
title: Mariëlle Vleugels
